description:
It is challenging to come up with an appropriate introduction for this game,
but if it's okay, I can quote the storyline of the game within the game.
'Leaving all the uncertainties behind, you have to perform significant or insignificant tasks from here on out.
Congratulations on being hired safely in this place...'

Gameplay?

W,A,S,D and mouse click. F key and mouse scroll somecases.

Check out this quick and easy mystery game that only takes 10-20 minutes to finish!

Game features?

■ A first-person walking simulator with pixel graphics

■ Glitches and mysteries, enjoyable and important tasks at a hotel
■ Sandwiches are not included in the game.
